name: decky-stt-keyboard
description: Speech-to-text virtual keyboard plugin for Steam Deck

scripts.prepare_dist: pnpm run build && shx rm -rf build && shx mkdir -p 'build/STT Keyboard/dist' && shx cp dist/index.js 'build/STT Keyboard/dist/' && shx cp package.json plugin.json LICENSE README.md 'build/STT Keyboard/' && shx cp backend/src/main.py 'build/STT Keyboard/' && shx cp -r defaults 'build/STT Keyboard/' && shx cp -r backend/lib 'build/STT Keyboard/'
scripts.package: pnpm run prepare_dist && cd build && zip -r '../decky-stt-keyboard-v1.2.2.zip' 'STT Keyboard'
scripts.deploy: pnpm run prepare_dist && rsync -azp --delete --rsh=ssh --exclude='.git' --exclude='node_modules' 'build/STT Keyboard/' deck@${DECK_IP}:homebrew/plugins/'STT Keyboard'
